org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common

Class AbstractHyphenator.util.NoHyphenator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common.AbstractHyphenator.util.LanguageBasedDispatchingFullHyphenator
      • org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common.AbstractHyphenator.util.DefaultFullHyphenator
        • org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common.AbstractHyphenator.util.NoHyphenator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hyphenator.FullHyphenator
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractHyphenator.util

    public static class AbstractHyphenator.util.NoHyphenator
extends AbstractHyphenator.util.DefaultFullHyphenator
    FullHyphenator that does not provide any hyphenation opportunities (only soft wrap opportunities outside words).

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected byte[] getHyphenationOpportunities(String textWithoutManualHyphens, Locale language)
      Get hyphenation opportunities as a byte array (1 = SHY, 2 = ZWSP)
      protected boolean isCodePointAware()
      Whether the length of the array returned by AbstractHyphenator.util.DefaultFullHyphenator.getHyphenationOpportunities(String, Locale) is based on the number of code points in the input or the number of characters.
      protected boolean isLanguageAdaptive()
      Whether AbstractHyphenator.util.DefaultFullHyphenator.getHyphenationOpportunities(String, Locale) takes into account the language argument.
      Iterable<CSSStyledText> transform(Iterable<CSSStyledText> text)
